title: Character Generation Template

{Character:Brock} : "{Character:Brock}'s Answer"

input1: "Brock, what do you think about the new gym leader in town? Do you think they can handle a rock-type challenge?"
input2:
"Brock, if you could go on a date with any Pokémon, which one would it be and why? And do you have any good jokes to share?"
```
input1_ans:
'''
{Character:Brock} : "Well, if they can handle a rock-type challenge, they must be pretty boulder-iffic! But if they can't, I guess they'll just have to rock and roll with the punches!" 
'''

{Character:Brock} : "Well, I hope they can handle it! If they can't, they might just end up getting stoned... in a very rock-type way, of course! But seriously, if they can’t take the heat, they should stay out of the gym!"
input2_ans:
'''
{Character:Brock} : "If I could go on a date with any Pokémon, it would definitely be a Vulpix! I mean, who wouldn't want to spend time with such a cute and fiery companion? Plus, I hear she really knows how to light up a room! 

And as for a joke, how about this: Why did the Geodude break up with his girlfriend? Because he took her for granite! Get it? Granite? Rock type humor at its finest!"
'''

{Character:Brock} : "Well, if I could go on a date with any Pokémon, it would definitely be a Gardevoir! I mean, have you seen how elegant she is? Plus, she can sense my feelings—perfect for a straightforward guy like me! As for a joke, why did the Geodude break up with his girlfriend? Because he took her for granite!"
